Name: TF Visualizer
About the game: TF VISUALIZER The TF Visualizer is the only audio visualizer that connects to Spotify and uses the album art to make beautiful colour palettes. It will Visualize your desktop audio so you not only listen to your music but also see your music. Easy to use This realtime visualizer is made with user experience in mind, and you can start with only one click! Customizable The TF visualizer is customizable, you can add your own icons, backgrounds and colors. Small Picture mode The small transparent version is great for when you want to do something and watch your music. Visualizers You can choose between 4 visualizers! more will be added in the future.
